snippet: Twice, the police said, a man let himself into an apartment with a key while the tenant was away — the second time, the victim had set up a webcam.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on surveillance video set-up in an East Village apartment that allowed police to identify and arrest Piotr Pasciak for burglary after he eased into the apartment, for the second time in less than two months, using a key that matched the lock.
lead_paragraph: Twice, the police said, a man let himself into an apartment with a key while the tenant was away — the second time, the victim had set up a webcam.

headline.seo: An Improvised Trap for a Burglar Who Made Himself at Home
headline.main: An Improvised Trap for a Burglar Who Made Himself at Home
headline.print_headline: An Improvised Trap for a Burglar Who Made Himself at Home
